# Architecture Decision Record (ADR)

- Status: <proposed|accepted|superseded>
- Date: <YYYY-MM-DD>
- Context:
  - <brief background and constraints>
- Decision:
  - <what we decided>
- Consequences:
  - Positive: <list>
  - Negative: <list>
- Alternatives considered:
  - <option 1 – why rejected>
  - <option 2 – why rejected>
- Links:
  - Related risks: <risk_register entry>
  - Tickets/PRs: <links>
